timeline.message: fix review comments on stress test + StressSubscriber

Add directAllOrNothing/directBestEffort multicast Sinks (#2392)

These new Sinks.Many are close to DirectProcessor, except they don't
terminate on backpressure. Instead, they either drop for all subscribers
(all or nothing) or for the slow subscribers only (best effort).
